00034 template<int M>
00035 class MeasurementMatrix : public Eigen::Matrix<double, 3*M, Eigen::Dynamic> {
00036 public:
00037   typedef Eigen::Matrix<double, 3*M,Eigen::Dynamic>             Base;
00038   typedef typename Eigen::Block<Base,3,1>                       PixelRef;
00039   typedef const typename Eigen::Block<const Base,3,1>           constPixelRef;
00040   typedef typename Base::ColXpr                                 ColXpr;
00041   typedef typename Base::ColsBlockXpr                           ColsBlockXpr;
00042   typedef typename Base::RowsBlockXpr                           ViewRef;
00043   using Base::col;
00044   using Base::row;
00045   using Base::cols;
00046   using Base::rows;
00047   using Base::middleRows;
00048   using Base::middleCols;
00049 
00050   MeasurementMatrix()                                           {}
00051   MeasurementMatrix(const CorrespondenceSet &);
00052   int   add_correspondence(const Correspondence &);
00053   bool  load(const char *);
00054   void  normalise(ImageTransform<M> &, bool fixedAspect=false);
00055   void  unscale();
00056   void  scale_and_fill(const MotionMatrix<M> &, const ShapeMatrix &);
00057   void  synthesise_measurements(const MotionMatrix<M> &, int, double);
00058   void  synthesise_occlusions(double);
00059   void  order_cols_by_occlusions();
00060   
00061   PixelRef      pixel(int,int);
00062   constPixelRef pixel(int,int) const;
00063   bool          pixel_is_occluded(int,int) const;
00064   ViewRef       view(int);
00065   
00066   void  insert_pixel(int, const GPixel &);
00067   void  merge_columns(int, int);
00068   int   new_column();
00069   int   new_columns(int);
00070   int   insert_columns(ColsBlockXpr);
00071   int   insert_column_and_expand(ColXpr);
00072   void  delete_column(int);
00073   void  delete_columns(int,int);
00074   int   column_containing(const GPixel &);
00075   int   rank(double = 0.0);
00076   bool  is_fully_expanded(int);
00077 
00078   template<class D>
00079   MeasurementMatrix &operator=(const Eigen::MatrixBase<D> &);
00080   
00081 };
